editorialNotes.standard: With exclusive film-inspired filters and powerful manual controls, this simple video camera transforms everyday footage into a masterpiece.

With a suite of powerful tools, touch-screen controls, gorgeous templates, and customizable effects, this full-featured editor is in a class of its own. Plus, with iCloud Drive, you can edit on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, wherever you are.
editorialNotes.short: Make your pictures shine with this set of photography tools.

editorialNotes.standard: Shooting movies on film may be a dying art, but just because we live in the digital age doesnt mean we have to abandon our analog past. We get warm, nostalgic fuzzies from 8mm Vintage Cameras grainy, flickery film filters and lens effects, conjuring up memories of vacation travelogues screened in wood-paneled basements. Its not just about old-school kicks, thoughthis powerful suite of tools can give any video an authentic period look.
editorialNotes.short: The easy way to create authentic vintage movies.

name: GoRemo: Go remote as pro hero

editorialNotes.standard: Wherever you are on your filmmaking journey, this multitrack video editor meets you there. Its features are rarely found in an iPad app, and everythings accessible through an intuitive touch interface.
editorialNotes.short: Apply transitions, effects and more with these powerful editing tools.

editorialNotes.standard: This incredible filtering tool will have you looking old-timey in no time. Hipstamatics awesome app is truly like nothing weve ever seen, transforming portraits into photographs that look hundreds of years old. Plus, thanks to a Photos app extension, you can edit pics right from your library.

ios.subtitle: Bring out the color and detail

editorialNotes.short: Adds extra sparkle to reflective and light-emitting objects.

editorialNotes.standard: Create professional-looking photos with minimal effort, thanks to Camera+s excellent manual controls for shooting, plus dozens of filters, frames, and tweaks to help perfect each shot. From adjusting your workflow to syncing your pictures to iCloud, Camera+s features have been meticulously crafted, refined, and innovated throughout the years.
